titleStmt.title: The speedy passage to heauen. Or A perfect direction for every true Christian, to walke in the right path of true holinesse for the sure attaining of euerlasting happinesse. Containing an explanation of the Tenne commandements, the Creede, and our Lords prayer: with diuers other godly prayers both for morning and euening.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Creede?] for Thomas Bushel,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 17706 on UMI microfilm.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 1491 #2 (Bodleian Library copy, identified as STC 17706), and at reel 1838 #5 (British Library).
